title: Parity Lab
description: Co-designed and developed a website for Parity Lab, a non-profit organization that aims to provide a platform for the public to engage in the political process. The website was designed to be user-friendly and informative, with a focus on accessibility and ease of use. The website features an interactive map that allows users to explore the political landscape in their area, as well as a blog that provides updates on the organization's work.
